project.objective:
PROSME-INN has the objective of delivering consultancy services, as Key Account Manager for the SME Instrument beneficiaries and enhancing innovation management capacity for SMEs in Romania RO3 statistical region.
The project involve two Enterprise Europe Network partner from PROSME BISNET consortium which will use various consultancy tools for services delivery.
project.title: PROSME SME- Improving management of innovation processes in SMEs
